item.title: By: Anneliese Taylor
item.dc:creator: Anneliese Taylor
item.description: I'm looking forward to trying out ZenDesk. Fingers crossed it'll offer a more user-friendly experience for possibly replacing Service Now.
item.content:encoded: I’m looking forward to trying out ZenDesk. Fingers crossed it’ll offer a more user-friendly experience for possibly replacing Service Now.

item.title: By: Richard Trott
item.dc:creator: Richard Trott
item.description: If you want to take a look at the stickies on boards pictured in this post (and I totally recommend looking at them in person!), they and a few other related boards are in the CKM (room 115) in the northwest corner of the room.
item.content:encoded: If you want to take a look at the stickies on boards pictured in this post (and I totally recommend looking at them in person!), they and a few other related boards are in the CKM (room 115) in the northwest corner of the room.
